name: Summer Breakdown
description:
😎 This is Tanning Tatum. 

He wants to get a perfect tan, but he doesn’t like people so much… 

You will have to choose between sunbathing to be handsome or moving away to avoid the nervous breakdown !

------------

CONTROLS

Clic on available place to move, or don't do anything to sunbath.

Manage his tanning (or "Handsomeness") and his temper (or "coolness"). 

Have fun !

------------
